name: Gunslinger Day: Zombie
description:
Plunge into the gloomy atmosphere of the underground bunker where you will face hundreds of enraged zombies ready to take away your life.

Various weapon will be your faithful assistants on the way to rescue.

Features of game:

- Full 3d! Forget about ugly 2d sprites!

- Like old-school light-gun game? Try it on mobile!

- Two different type of control - joystick and tap

- Various professional guns: M9, MP5, M16, AK47, MK11

- Soundtrack creates an atmosphere of pure action

- Kill different kinds of zombies

- Thrilling levels

- Increase your weapons and hp
